'''Chris Nordgren''' is a virtual effects artist and 3D artist at [[Mojang Studios]], who worked on ''[[Minecraft Dungeons]]''. He had also developed and published ''Everhood'' and ''Everhood 2'' alongside Jordi Roca, as ''Foreign Gnomes''.
